name: Dong Dong DongMV
lyric:
dong dong dong

joyside

(边远)

baby you can't break my heart anymore
baby you're gonna lose my arms that gave you warmth
the night is burning
my sight is quenching
i gave you real love
but you want more

baby you won't see my tears anymore
baby i won't feel the fears anymore
the night is burning
my sight is quenching
you want real love
but i gave you more

(all the sadness will go away from us ,please wait for the sun shine again.
to our dear joyside)

i gave you real love
but you want more

baby you can't break my heart anymore
baby you won't see my tears anymore
the night is burning
my sight is quenching
i gave you real love, but you want more

can you feel my love
can you feel my love from this wasted heart
can you feel my love
can you feel my love from this wasted heart

oh the stars, dont you shine so bright
dont twinge my eyes
the world is still too old for us to know

can you feel my love,
can you feel my love from this wasted heart
can you feel my love



end

边远

来自android客户端

我今天在车上的时候刚刚解决掉剧组里一个棘手的问题，把要逃掉的演员给抓回来了。我给她打了好多电话，我当时想，除了小鱼我还给谁打这么多电话啊！又不是小鱼我求她回来干嘛！一边生气一边给她说好话。她给我回电话的时候我好开心，就是一种失而复得的体验，海边阳光还不错，如果你可以回我一下消息，像我想的那样和我做一个好朋友就好了！但是…你也知道我好爱你对8，跟你讲这个是我没有办法的事情，就像你不喜欢我一样，也是没有办法的事情。

最近的心情。
雨水淹没着河畔旁哭泣的你，悄无声息；泪水化作回忆流入大海，连绵不绝；乌云遮住最后一缕阳光，使你迷失在人群；昨日的光影总是那么温暖，忽隐忽现。最后我只剩下感动，感动他为你所做的一切，为了你放弃了你，这才是真爱，抉择与放弃即在一念之间，像我阅历浅薄真的不懂怎样安慰，听首歌吧@QeoQ
